feed.title: InvenTree Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] Fix for chart rendering (#8981) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8982
  • [0.17.x] Select first and only pending shipment for sales order barcode allocation (#8984) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8986
  • [0.17.x] Debounce checkLoginState to prevent unexpected redirection during testing (#9012) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9016
  • [0.17.x] Report bugfix (#9013) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9014

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.4...0.17.5

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] Enhance creation of default settings (#9028) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9029
  • [0.17.x] feat(backend): Improve error with missing manifest (#8957) by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9036
  • [0.17.x] Fix for data import (#9060) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9065

Devops / Setup Changes

  • Adjust playwright testing by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9043
  • [Backport] Update supported postgres-cli version to 15 by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9042

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9019

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.5...0.17.6

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] Bug fix for receiving line item event (#9071) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9072

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9067

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.6...0.17.7

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [UI] Pricing fix backporty by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9124
  • [0.17.x] Ignore inactive parts (#9125) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9128
  • [0.17.x] Barcode validation fix (#9127) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9130
  • Batch code backport by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9138
  • [0.17.x] Use ref pattern on PO duplicate (#9100) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9147
  • [0.17.x] Handle case of null stock location (#9183) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9187
  • [0.17.x] Add 'note' field to form (#9186) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9188
  • [0.17.x] Remove restriction on row action (#9201) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9202
  • [0.17.x] Fix font size in location column (#9230) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9231
  • [0.17.x] Tracking api fix (#9238) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9240
  • [0.17.x] Auto-fill currency for new supplier part (#9286) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9287
  • Fix asset file serving by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9295

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9112
  • [0.17.x] [UI] Table Update (#9220) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9221
  • [0.17.x] Ignore sentry for TemplateSyntaxError (#9239) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9241

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.7...0.17.8

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [Backport] Call machine func (#9191) by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9298
  • [Bug] Import fix (#9008) by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9321
  • Tweak for data import (#9010) by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9322

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9297
  • [0.17.x] Prevent sentry reporting in test mode (#9304) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9306
  • [0.17.x] Fix currency rendering (#9308) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/9310

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.8...0.17.9
